text: Csobánka is a village in Pest County, Budapest metropolitan area, Hungary. Csobánka is located in the Pilis Mountains which is a National Park in Hungary. The name Csobánka comes from Ottoman Turkish چوبان (çoban) rooted in < Persian چوبان (čubân). which means shepherd.http://www.magyarnevek.hu/?page=male&char;=Cs The word csobán originated from the settlement of the Magyars in Hungary. The earliest record of the official name was mentioned in a tax minute-book on January 3, 1698. ==International relations== Csobánka is twinned with: * Wertheim am Main , since 1992 ==References== ==External links== *Official website of Csobánka (in Hungarian) Category:Populated places in Pest County Category:Budapest metropolitan area Category:Serb communities in Hungary
title: Csobánka
